LanguageData.VWE_ThumpRetrofit.label: thump retrofit
LanguageData.VWE_ThumpRetrofit.description: This weapon incorporates reverse-engineered mechanoid technology to fire heavy, blunt-force energy slugs that devastate structures and armor at the cost of range.
LanguageData.VWE_AcidInjectorFlechettes.label: acid-injector flechettes
LanguageData.VWE_AcidInjectorFlechettes.description: This weapon has been re-barreled to fire fin-stabilized acid-injector flechettes. These rounds cause horrific internal dissolution in organic targets but are useless against mechanoids.
LanguageData.VWE_DeserterMarkings.label: deserter markings
LanguageData.VWE_DeserterMarkings.description: This weapon bears defaced Imperial crests; equipping it in the presence of Imperial caravans or visitors will be recognized as treason, causing an immediate and severe drop in relations.
LanguageData.VWE_HighAngleDraw.label: high-angle draw
LanguageData.VWE_HighAngleDraw.description: This weapon is strung for extreme parabolic arcing, allowing arrows to be lobbed over walls and obstacles to hit unseen targets, though it is impossible to aim precisely.
LanguageData.VWE_LuckyShots.label: lucky shots
LanguageData.VWE_LuckyShots.description: This weapon's action is tuned for occasional moments of perfect alignment, granting a chance for shots to bypass defenses and inflict significant bonus damage.
LanguageData.VWE_MakeshiftTrait.label: makeshift
LanguageData.VWE_MakeshiftTrait.description: This weapon is cobbled together from mismatched parts with a faulty sear mechanism. It is wildly unpredictable; sometimes it fails to fire entirely, while other times it accidentally discharges a double-length burst.
LanguageData.VWE_AncientTrait.label: ancient
LanguageData.VWE_AncientTrait.description: This weapon is a relic from a bygone era, its internal stress fractures held together by mere luck. It functions normally for a limited time, but after a set number of shots, the mechanism will shatter completely and the weapon will be destroyed.
LanguageData.VWE_CryptoRounds.label: crypto rounds
LanguageData.VWE_CryptoRounds.description: This weapon fires rounds coated in active cryptoparticles that induce a rapid stasis-freeze effect on impact.
LanguageData.VWE_VoidInscriptions.label: void inscriptions
LanguageData.VWE_VoidInscriptions.description: This weapon is etched with shifting, non-euclidean glyphs that whisper to the wielder, continually draining their mental stability while equipped.
